snippet: The body of Ms. Sutton, 50, was found Saturday at Ataturk Airport in Istanbul, where she had been for a layover on her way to Iraq.
abstract: Turkish police investigate death of British journalist and activist Jacky Sutton, whose body was found at Istanbul airport.
lead_paragraph: The body of Ms. Sutton, 50, was found Saturday at Ataturk Airport in Istanbul, where she had been for a layover on her way to Iraq.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Turkey: Police Look Into Death of British Activist at Airport
headline.main: Turkey Investigates Death of Jacky Sutton, a British Journalist
